@graph.name: Gigascience_Fusions_demonstration_STS26T-Gent_Workflow
@graph.description:
Create a protein Fusion database through the Arriba workflow

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Neoantigen 1: Fusion-Database-Generation](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/proteomics/tutorials/neoantigen-1-fusion-database-generation/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes a [Galaxy Workflow Report](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/galaxy/workflows_report_view.html)
